c:complexType.name: QuantitativeScaleExtensionPoint
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The class of protovis quantitative scales' extension points.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: dateTickFormat
c:property.c:documentation:
A fixed protovis date format mask to use to format date tick values.
By default, the tick format is determined dynamically to match the range of the data. Specify this extension point if the automatically determined format does not suit your needs.
See the date format protovis documentation at .
If you need to adapt the format based on the chosen precision, you should use the axis option, , instead.

c:property.name: dateTickPrecision
c:property.c:documentation:
A fixed precision to generate date tick values, in milliseconds.
The precision measures the distance between tick values. By default, the tick precision is determined dynamically to match the range of the data. Specify this extension point if the automatically determined precision does not suit your needs.
You can use the pvc.time.intervals enumeration to specify standard time intervals. For more information see .

c:property.name: dateTickWeekStart
c:property.c:documentation:
The start day of the week for date ticks of week precision.
The possible values are:
0 - Sunday
1 - Monday
2 - Tuesday
3 - Wednesday
4 - Thursday
5 - Friday
6 - Saturday
